input.sentences: here at this beautiful home | lives a big family .
the family likes to have fun and hang out under umbrellas .
dogs love children and love to play .
kids like to relax and be calm .
best of all | there is food to eat and enjoy .
output.sentences: She lives at a nice home with her family.
But they do strange things with umbrellas because each of them likes to hang them in odd places.
They cover up their weirdness with play and the love of dogs.
When it's time to relax, the kids calm down with the help of valium.
Crab legs are the only food the family does enjoy to eat.
